title: Innocent Intentions: 244 Word Experiences for Lovers Book 3 in the Sacred Love Secrets Series
description: These 244 word experiences for lovers take the reader into Sherifa's inner world of joy, loss, freedom and celebration. They speak to the edge where love reflects in every aspect of life, flowing between the abstract and the very personal. This book is dedicated to those looking for a simple answer to every question.
author: Sherifa
